question.title: Getting remainder without any condition
question.body:
I have come across the following coding challenge,

        int type1 = (number % 3 == 0 && number % 5 != 0) ? 1 : 0;
        int type2 = (number % 3 != 0 && number % 5 == 0) ? 2 : 0;
        int type3 = (number % 3 == 0 && number % 5 == 0) ? 3 : 0;

        int result = type1 + type2 + type3;

        switch (result) {
            case 1:
                return "Type 1";
            case 2:
                return "Type 2";
            case 3:
                return "Type 3";
            default:
                return String.valueOf(number);
        }
    }

Can it be done without if, else, ternary, switch case ?
